effect: Vehicle cannot be operated, significantly impacting customer ability to use the car
cause: Battery dead or starter motor malfunction due to age or manufacturing defect
existing_controls: Visual battery inspection, starter motor diagnostic tests
recommended_action: Replace battery or repair starter motor; implement more rigorous pre-delivery testing
additional_notes: This is the most common complaint in cold weather conditions

effect: Loss of braking power, creating a serious safety hazard for the driver and passengers
cause: Corroded brake line or failed brake fluid seal due to age or corrosion
existing_controls: Regular brake fluid level checks, visual inspection of brake lines
recommended_action: Replace corroded brake lines and seals; implement stainless steel brake line option
additional_notes: Critical safety issue - requires immediate action

effect: Reduced vehicle aesthetics, customer dissatisfaction, and increased corrosion risk
cause: Poor surface preparation before painting or inadequate paint primer application
existing_controls: Visual paint quality inspection per ISO standard
recommended_action: Improve surface preparation process, implement stricter quality checks

effect: Reduced vehicle acceleration, loss of control, and safety concerns
cause: Low transmission fluid level or worn clutch plates due to high mileage
existing_controls: Transmission fluid level monitoring during service
recommended_action: Replace transmission fluid at recommended intervals, repair or replace clutch

failure_mode: Air conditioning system not cooling adequately
effect: Customer discomfort during driving, reduced climate control effectiveness
cause: Refrigerant leak or AC compressor failure
existing_controls: Regular AC maintenance checks before summer season
recommended_action: Locate and repair refrigerant leaks, repair or replace AC compressor
